name: UpdateMonitorConfiguration
description:
Update monitor configuration details using an ID.

This tool updates the settings of a specific monitor configuration by using its ID. It should be used when there's a need to modify existing monitor settings.

parameters.name: monitor_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the monitor whose configuration needs to be updated.

parameters.name: monitor_configuration_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the new configuration details for the monitor.
